entries.summary: Scaled a decentralised treasury that funds early-stage space and energy research, backed by programmable incentives.
entries.body: Designed and launched AuroraChain, a community-owned network pooling capital and expertise for frontier science. Built token mechanics, contributor reputation graphs, and a research review pipeline that ships grants in weeks instead of quarters.

entries.title: Lunar Habitat Systems: autonomous construction playbook
entries.summary: Field notes on orchestrating autonomous crews to assemble resilient habitats on the lunar south pole.
entries.body: Synthesises research from my residency at the Orbital Systems Lab. Covers robotics swarms, regolith sintering, and crypto-economic incentives to coordinate international partners.

entries.title: Mission control copilot for deep-space robotics
entries.summary: Built a decision support copilot blending telemetry, simulations, and human expertise for near-real-time mission ops.
entries.body: Led the design of a mission control surface trusted by distributed teams. Integrated predictive models, anomaly detection, and collaborative triage to keep robotics fleets safe beyond Earth.
